H0.text: when did south sudan join east african community. 2010

H1.text: when did south sudan join east african community. 2014

H2.text: when did south sudan join east african community. 2012

H3.text: when did south sudan join east african community. 2016

A4.text: South Sudan was eventually approved for membership to the bloc in March 2016, and signed a treaty of accession in April 2016.

A5.text: It had six months to ratify the agreement, which it did on 5 September, at which point it formally acceded to the community.
